profile.name: Marcel Pahnke
profile.description: I started with web design in 9th grade as a hobby and kept doing it till 11th grade where I decided to learn it the right way. In 2014 i had my first real job as a freelance web designer and also started as a Lecturer in my old school for some basic web courses. Now I study web development in Berlin and met some great people with the same interests so we quickly started working together ... the collective is now called v1b.es
section.exp.05.desc: this is a list test, maybe it works like this
section.exp.06.desc: A tight-knit collective of creatives {br} offers professional consulting and builds sites combining innovative design and a holistic experience for the user. Working as a collaborative collective enables us to put together the best team for every project and work with highest agility.
link.label: see more
project.grotesk.desc: Grotesk is a minimalistic and responsive portfolio theme for Jekyll designed for focus and simplicity. It features four different color schemes, a large cover image, and a clean layout.
